code:
---
id: auth-metrics-flow
title: "SmartEdify – Auth Metrics Flow"
description: "Instrumentation path for login, refresh, and password recovery metrics across the auth lifecycle."
updated: 2025-02-14
tags: [Education_StudentDB]
---
flowchart TD
    subgraph Request[Education_StudentDB]
        L[Education_GradeSync]
        V[Education_ClassroomService]
        H[Education_ContentCDN]
        T[Education_ContentCDN]
        R[Education_GradeSync]
    end

    L --> V --> H -->|ok| T --> R
    H -->|fail| F[Education_LMS_Portal]

    subgraph Metrics[Education_StudentDB]
        MS[Education_LMS_Portal]
        MF[Education_ClassroomService]
        MR[Education_ContentCDN]
        MP[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end

    R --> MS
    F --> MF

    subgraph Refresh[Education_ClassroomService]
        C[Education_ContentCDN] -->|reuse| RU[Education_GradeSync]
        C -->|clean| NI[Education_StudentDB]
    end

    T --> C
    RU --> MR
    PS[Education_StudentDB] --> MP

    classDef metric fill:#eef,stroke:#336
    class MS,MF,MR,MP metric
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
